adjectives.description: heartbroken (comparative more heartbroken, superlative most heartbroken)

entries.meaning: Suffering from grief, especially after a failed romance.
examples: When he told me he didn't want to see me anymore, I was heartbroken.
Synonyms: brokenhearted, inconsolable, forlorn, despairing, dejected, disconsolate, distraught, devastated, wretched, grief-stricken, discouraged
